title: Boston National Historical Park: Special Park Use Permits
body: "The Revolution was in the minds and hearts of the people..."  Discover how one city could be the Cradle of Liberty, site of the first major battle of American Revolution, and home to many who espoused that freedom can be extended to all.              Rosies Invade the Navy Yard   Celebrate the women workers of the Charlestown Navy Yard            Today at the Park   Find out what's going on in the park today.        Plan Your Visit   Check here for what to do or see!              Evening Tours   Join a Park Ranger and explore Charlestown at sunset!        Mass Memories Road Show: Boston's Navy Y   Join the crew! We are looking for volunteers to help bring the Mass. Memories Road Show to the Charlestown Navy Yard in the summer of 2017.
